subject: Logotypes
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: We invited some professional designers to submit proposals (below) for what they think the Super Bowl logo should look like. They were given a blank slate — no rules or guidelines at all in terms of how the image should look.
snippet: We invited some professional designers to submit proposals (below) for what they think the Super Bowl logo should look like. They were given a blank slate — no rules or guidelines at all in terms of how the image should look.
